about_the_game: Mindbreak Mansion invites players to embark on a captivating journey through a labyrinthine mansion filled with secrets and puzzles waiting to be unraveled. Delve into a world of mystery and intrigue as you explore intricately designed rooms, each presenting unique challenges and brain-teasing puzzles to solve. From deciphering cryptic codes to manipulating complex mechanisms, every step forward brings you closer to uncovering the mansion's deepest secrets. Immerse yourself in the atmospheric surroundings, where every creaking floorboard and flickering light adds to the tension and excitement. With each puzzle solved, the layers of mystery peel away, revealing the truth behind the mansion's enigmatic past. Will you have the wit and determination to escape Mindbreak Mansion's grasp, or will you become entangled in its mind-bending allure forever?

Delve into a world of mystery and intrigue as you explore intricately designed rooms, each presenting unique challenges and brain-teasing puzzles to solve. From deciphering cryptic codes to manipulating complex mechanisms, every step forward brings you closer to uncovering the mansion's deepest secrets. Immerse yourself in the atmospheric surroundings, where every creaking floorboard and flickering light adds to the tension and excitement. With each puzzle solved, the layers of mystery peel away, revealing the truth behind the mansion's enigmatic past. Will you have the wit and determination to escape Mindbreak Mansion's grasp, or will you become entangled in its mind-bending allure forever?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, Apple M2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Mindbreak Mansion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 7600 GT or AMD Radeon X1650
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Enter the enigmatic world of Mindbreak Mansion, where puzzles and mysteries await around every corner. Solve intricate challenges, unlock hidden secrets, and unravel the mysteries of this captivating adventure. Will you escape the mansion's grasp, or succumb to its mind-bending allure?
